column1: #Text=" Korra says : " I just do n't understand why I ca n't get back to my former self .
#Text=I 'm tentative , I 'm out of sync , I just ca n't get back in the groove .
#Text=" Toph says : " Probably carrying around that metal does n't help .
#Text=" Toph says : " The little bits of metal poison stuck in your body .
#Text=Are you trying to tell me you ca n't feel metal in your own body ?
#Text=You really are the worst Avatar ever .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought Su got it all out .
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , my girls never really picked up metalbending all that well , if you ask me .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's been my problem this entire time !
#Text=You can get it out for me , right ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Who do you think you 're talking to ?
